Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Children | Family
Status: Returning Series
Network: BBC One ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Sundays at 08:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: January, 2000

Child of Our Time is a massive, 20-year project by the BBC, that follows 25 children born at the dawn of the Millenium from diverse racial, genetic, social and econonic backgrounds. The children and their families are studied by a team of researchers, and each year in January there is a new series that examines the progress and changes that have occured so far. Hosted by Doctor Robert Winston.

(http://www.tvrage.com/Child_Of_Our_Time)
